title: Studio - Desirable Nob Hill Location@ Washington/Powell
postBody:
This Charming Studio is located on the first floor of a three story building that's been earthquake retro fitted. The three windows bring in lots of natural light and has an updated open kitchen with a four burner electric cook top. Studio has w/w carpet and a nice updated bathroom along with a individual wall heater. Easy walking distances to the financial district, Chinatown, North Beach and Union Square.

IMPORTANT NOTE: There are a few construction projects going on down the block from the building. The Central subway, Gordon Lau School and the Hospital. Please try and walk/drive through the area to get a clear picture of the construction and noise during the day before scheduling a viewing of the unit. Most of the noise is during the day while folks are at work but we can't control the construction and they do start at around 7:00 a.m. and on occasion will work until 6:30 p.m.

Showing of this unit Starts Saturday, May 2, 2015

Note: Single Occupancy only
.Laundry mat (1 Block away)
.Public Library (1/2 block)
.Hospital w/24 hrs emergency 1 Block
.Cable car (on corner)
.Two bus lines (1 block )
.Owner pays water & garbage (Tenants pay all other utilities)
.Street Parking (permit area sticker can be purchase from the city)
.Sorry no pet and Absolutely no smoking of any kind in unit or any area of the building

Requirements:
1 year lease with first month rent $1750 plus $2000 security deposit. Applicant will need to complete a no fee rental application and must be able to provide current credit report along with verifiable rental and employment references. To schedule a viewing please e-mail show contact info or call or text Lily at show contact info with date and time you like to see the unit. Please note, weekday appointment will be schedule after 10:30 a.m. and weekends appointment after 12:30 p.m.

title: garage, storage, fire place, hardwood, Edwardian condo
postBody:
$3900, Large 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom Stylish condominium in a 4-unit Edwardian building in Inner Richmond. Private garage parking included. The unit is sunny and bright, and has lots of details. Updated modern kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances; hardwood floors throughout, a large living room with a working fireplace, a formal dining room, good closet and storage space. There is a washer and dryer in the building. The unit is in a great location: easy access to UCSF, good transportation to Downtown/Financial District, within walking distance to Young Museum in Golden Gate park, and easy access to the US 101-N and I 280-S freeways. title: $3750mo - Furnished 2+ Bedroom on sunny Potrero Hill
postBody:
AVAILABLE MAY 23rd

Walk through the classic Farley's Coffeehouse, grab yourself a latte and then walk up the back stairs to your flat in the sky!

World travelers and people who need a temporary home are welcome to stay in our comfortable, eclectic attic apartment with amazing City and Bay views from every room. Enjoy a quick commute downtown, jump on 280 to go down south or just enjoy the quaint neighborhood of Potrero Hill. It's a great SF pad to enjoy while you are in here for an internship, in transition or just getting to know the City.

-- Lots of light, windows and skylights
-- Two bedrooms, each with closets
-- Living room with sofa sleeper
-- Office nook with desk
-- Fully equipped kitchen
-- Flat screen TV
-- Deck with table, chairs, view of the Bay and sunshine!
-- Newly remodeled clawfoot tub-shower and separate sink and bathroom
-- Upstairs from Farley's Coffeehouse, a SF classic

-- Laundry mat across the street
-- Charming neighborhood restaurants within short walking distance

-- No smokers and no pets

-- Available for 2-6 month rental

title: Jr1Bd,AwesomeLayout,PrimeLoc&BayViews-OpnHouse: Wed 29th@6:30 pm
postBody:
Exec. Studio/ Jr. 1 BR, Pacific Heights -$2650.

Fantastic Jr. 1 Bed Room in prime Pacific Heights Location! Stunning Panoramic view of the North Bay and Iconic San Francisco skyline! Ingenious interior layout... Separate Bedroom, Living room and Kitchen/Dining room spaces!!! Recently renovated with all appliances furnished... You've gotta see it.

How perfect is this place? See for yourself...Our location scores 94 points out of 100 on walk.com!!!

Want to see more of us? Check us out at flickr: http://www.flickr.com/photos/pacificave2120/sets/72157622624603143/show/

OPEN HOUSE is being held this Wednesday April 29th, beginning at 6:30 pm
2120 Pacific Ave. @ Laguna Apt. 207

Unfortunately we are unable to accommodate individual showings at this time.

A credit processing fee will apply for each applicant interested in renting the apartment. Please bring Check, NO CASH payments accepted.

About the Neighborhood-
Hilltop views with Pacific Heights appeal and Marina convenience...
Just 3 flat blocks from popular Fillmore Street with its shops, markets and restaurants, and more.
4 easy blocks downhill to Union Street with even more shops, couture stores, cafes, restaurants and exciting nightlife and more
4 flat blocks to VanNess Ave.
Convenient to public transportation: within a 4 block or less radius are stops for the 90, 76, 49, 47, 41, 27, 22, 20, 12 and 1.
2 blocks from Lafayette Park, and within walking distance of Alta Plaza Park, Marina, Presidio, and about a 15 minute jog to Fisherman's Wharf, Fort Mason, Fort Scott, Fort Point or the Palace of Fine Arts.

About the Building-
2120 Pacific Avenue is a very well kept, modern 5 story apartment building located atop of the hill in Pacific Heights which offers its tenants the peace of mind provided by better earthquake construction and effective fire safety devices.
The lobby is beautify furnished, and houses a lush indoor tropical garden, fountain and sculpture. Passing through it on the way to the office in the morning is almost like escaping to the tropics for just a few moments before you go to work.
The building has its own beautiful refurbished Elevator for your convenience.
Laundry facilities are located in the building, and contain 5 dryers, 2 washing machines and 1 large capacity washing machine (all new equipment).
The telephone intercom system alerts you of your visitors, on your home or cell phone, at home or while your away, you can even grant entry to the building from anywhere with your cell phone! Indoor, remote access parking garage facility.

About the Apartment-
$2650-This apartment is a studio/jr.1bd with amazing North Bay views, tons of light and a fantastic layout.
Wall of windows in Spacious and open living area overlooking beautiful views of the bay.
The Sleeping area is separated from the rest of the living space to provide you with privacy and a more comfortable atmosphere for entertaining in the living space
The galley kitchen which opens into the Dining area is fantastic for hosting and entertaining.
Beautifully renovated recently with Stove, Refrigerator, and Dishwasher furnished for your convenience, and carpeted for your comfort.
Bathroom with Vanity , Medicine Cabinet, Tile Floors, Sliding Glass Shower Doors, Tiled Showers, Bath Tub with Shower
Ample closet storage: built-in shelving in the oversized bedroom closet with mirrored sliding doors, and a coat closet in the entry hallway.

1 year lease term, continuing month to month thereafter.
No Pets of any kind.
Deposit equal to one month rent.
There is rent control in San Francisco.

Key Points Review-

Rent: $2650- Jr.1 Bed Room
Security Deposit: Equal to one month's rent & due at lease signing (To be submitted in the form of a Cashier's Check).
Lease Term: 1year then Month to Month
Utilities provided: Water & Garbage
Parking: Street
Laundry: Facilities in Building
Pets: None

Photos are for demonstration purposes only and while they are representational of the available unit they may or may not be of the actual unit available.

title: Pac Heights, Across from a Park, Terrific Location, Good Light, View
postBody:
Available starting in May or June.

This is a 2nd floor south facing unit on a slope with great light in an old converted 1908 single family home on Alta Plaza Park, now with 7 units total.

Parking is just good enough along the park because of the lower density that no one in the last 15 years has rented a spot at the hospital 3 blocks away.

See floor plan - works best as a 2 bedroom when reasonable for one bedroom to be off the other (such as with a child, short term guest, or home office). However can be, and has been, configured as two separate bedrooms with separate access if one swaps the bedroom and living room.

No dishwasher, though space to hook a stand alone one up. Huge closet, hardwood floors, small powder room. Can be lightly furnished.

postBody:

Master bedroom has remodeled walk-in closet. Also has stand alone bathroom and shower only accessible via the bedroom.

Room is not furnished. However the rest of the apartment is furnished.

There is an in-unit washer/dryer within the condo that has been serviced in the last 6 months. No need for laundromat.

Easy access to the 5, 5L, 31, 31AX and 18 MUNI Lines. 5L and 31AX are faster commuter lines that go all the way into downtown/Financial District within 30-40 minutes of boarding.

title: OPEN SUN 4/26 @ 11AM ID#1495: NOPA Tp Flr Rnvtd 3BR/2BA Apt w/Pkg
postBody:
SHOWN: SUNDAY, 4/26 @ 11:00AM AT 43 BARCELONA

ID#1495: NOPA Top Floor Renovated 3BR/2BA Apartment w/Parking

On the top floor of a 3-unit building, this completely renovated unit has been modernized and re-finished with attention to detail. There are 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms & beautiful hardwood floors throughout. The large living room has a gas fireplace with marble surround and views from Sutro Tower to the tops of the Golden Gate Bridge. A formal dining room connects to the living room. The modern kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, gleaming white finished cabinetry, gray Corian countertops, breakfast bar, and an adjacent breakfast/family room. The bedrooms are spacious and the bathrooms have also been updated with tile, glass enclosed showers, and quartz countertops. The master bath with a double shower is en-suite to the master bedroom and the 2nd bathroom is a "Jack & Jill" between the other 2 bedrooms. Washer/dryer conveniently located in-unit and 1-car garage parking is included. Walk to NOPA, Target, Best Buy, Trader Joe's and close to the many shops and restaurants on Geary Blvd. This is great opportunity to live in a like-new condition property.
